DOC.brief_title: Clinician Access Soldier Suicide Information ( CASSI )
DOC.detailed_description: As first step toward overall goal project , investigator use data T2 conduct first stage feasibility study . Specifically , investigator attempt match Social Security number ( SSNs ) Soldiers suicidal thought and/or behavior DoDSER SSNs Veterans seek mental health service VA United States . Once first step accomplish , investigator also aim describe group Veterans DoDSERs access VA service ( i.e. , demographic information , military service variable , health care utilization variable ) attempt good understand group . It anticipate study successful , next step would explore possibility DoDSER data share VA partner toward attainment follow long-term goal : 1 . Sharing information history active duty suicidal thought and/or behavior among discharged individual seek mental health service VA system ; 2 . Facilitating identification Veterans ; 3 . Reducing VA clinician burden though effective access exist data may help assessment treatment planning ; 4 . Lowering health care cost effective early management ; 5 . Improving quality care Veterans seek service VA outpatient mental health clinic .
